nodes.bodyText: In the entity the method is getId/setId. Should we use this method- and fieldname as well since all other methods are consistent in comparison?

In the old hateoas there was an ID property of the resouce so that we had to use an alternative.
Since the change of behaviour would affect the rest service I'd prefer to create a dedicated ticket for this issue and all entities
